name: Lost Cookie
description:
January 2016

This is my first game - I played around with GameMaker's basics then added some last-second audio. Thanks for checking it out!

I've submitted this game to both One Game A Month (http://www.onegameamonth.com/) and Sugar, Sweets, & Jam (http://itch.io/jam/sugar-sweets-jam), both of which are great. Although Lost Cookie isn't spectacular, I wanted to join in, and one has to start somewhere.

Thanks again,
T TZL
[http://tzl.itch.io/]
[http://www.onegameamonth.com/vsKingDedede]

Notes:

  • You'll notice the jumping is absurd...I just left it!
  • I thought I had access to all of FL Studio, but I currently do not, so what you hear is something I made really quickly in the demo. It's pretty obnoxious, right?
